about_the_game:
*INTRO*


"Hey, what are you watching right now? Perhaps, a show of some sort? What is it about? Do you relate to the characters? I bet you do."

"Now, I am not a big fan of shows in general. I find them entirely too predictable, repetitive, even boring to some extent. But, I find myself in an odd position as of late... You see, I do not tend to get involved, but someone decided to take it upon themselves to keep altering the script of MY show. Can you imagine?"

"Do not get me wrong, I am thoroughly entertained. I have not had this much fun ever since that one time. Do you remember? When I made that fool fall for my lies and he abandoned all he knew and blatantly put his fate into my hands. That was the last time I actually took part in altering the world's script... Do you remember what it led to? Ah yes, horrible, so horrible... Anyway. "

"It is happening again, can you believe it? What? No, not me this time, I am just as shocked as you are."

"Huh? You think that I should get involved? Well, that would be appropriate I guess, this existence is messing with my creation after all."

"One has to learn from experience. I am to show this being that the SCRIPT is NOT worth CHANGING."



*DESCRIPTION*


VICE:PROLOGUE is the first piece of a nine-part series of games, all contributing to one not so pleasant story. In this part, you will take on HER role. You have surrendered your torso and limbs, so all you have left is your head. Due to this unfortunate event, you can only interact so much with the world, those around you are the ones who will be doing the most work. Think of yourself as a puppeteer. Do not forget - you are not from here, this world is a crooked mirror of the one you come from. To know your purpose, maybe you should pay attention to your 'supposed' reflection.

The purpose of your journey is obtain knowledge of how to change the SCRIPT of your world most effectively. In order to do so, you are to listen in on the RESIDENCE'S conversations and guide them accordingly. You will get to interact with the world by making suggestions, solving puzzles and delivering items. However, you access to rooms is limited - pay attention and you will hear when a door opens or closes.

Have fun seeking ~~~

content_descriptors.notes: The game uses mature language and has visuals with non-realistic blood.

short_description: She is not satisfied. She believes that a 'perfect' world is ugly, lacking of tragic beauty. He is curious. He holds all that is 'wrong' behind a mirrored illusion on the screen of his TV. Wouldn't it be so fun to have these two opposing views collide into one? For the sake of knowledge, of course.
